description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国直辖市、国家中心城市、超大城市。位于中国西南部、长江上游地区，是西部大开发的重要战略支点。有文字记载的历史达3000多年，是巴蜀文化的发祥地。抗日战争时期曾为中华民国战时首都。1997年因三峡工程的需要再次成为直辖市。
description.en: A direct-administered municipality, national central city, and megacity of the People's Republic of China. Located in southwestern China and the upper reaches of the Yangtze River, it is a crucial strategic point for the Western Development. With a recorded history of over 3000 years, it is the birthplace of Bashu culture. It served as the wartime capital of the Republic of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War. In 1997, it was re-established as a direct-administered municipality due to the needs of the Three Gorges Project.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共重庆市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently the Communist Party Secretary of Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任重庆市市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently the Mayor of Chongqing.

nodes.id: 中国共产党重庆市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党重庆市委员会
en: Chongqing Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在重庆市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Communist Party of China in Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 重庆市的最高地方行政机关。
description.en: The highest local administrative organ of Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的中央政府，在抗日战争期间迁都重庆。
description.en: The central government of the Republic of China, which relocated its capital to Chongqing during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪30-40年代中国抵抗日本侵略的全面战争。战争期间，国民政府迁都重庆，使重庆成为中国的战时首都。
description.en: A full-scale war fought in the 1930s and 1940s between China and Japan. During the war, the Nationalist Government moved its capital to Chongqing, making it China's wartime capital.

description.zh-cn: 南宋第三位皇帝。因即位前藩封于恭州（重庆古称），即位后认为这是“双重喜庆”，遂将恭州升格并赐名“重庆”。
description.en: The third emperor of the Southern Song dynasty. Before his accession, he was enfeoffed in Gongzhou (the ancient name of Chongqing). After ascending the throne, he considered this a 'double celebration' and thus elevated Gongzhou's status and renamed it 'Chongqing'.

description.zh-cn: 南宋第二位皇帝，宋光宗赵惇之父。
description.en: The second emperor of the Southern Song dynasty, father of Emperor Guangzong (Zhao Dun).

description.zh-cn: 战国时期秦国政治家。灭巴国后屯兵江州，修筑江州城，为史载重庆建城之始。
description.en: A politician of the Qin state during the Warring States period. After conquering the state of Ba, he stationed troops in Jiangzhou and built the city wall, marking the recorded beginning of Chongqing's city construction.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家，在二战期间对重庆进行了长达数年的战略轰炸。
description.en: An East Asian country that conducted strategic bombing of Chongqing for several years during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 在抗日战争期间，由日本对作为中国战时首都的重庆进行的长期战略轰炸。
description.en: The long-term strategic bombing of Chongqing, China's wartime capital, by Japan during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国时期的一场政治运动，期间重庆发生了大规模武斗事件。
description.en: A political movement in the People's Republic of China, during which large-scale armed conflicts occurred in Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间在重庆发生的大规模武装冲突，对城市造成了严重破坏。
description.en: Large-scale armed conflicts that occurred in Chongqing during the Cultural Revolution, causing severe damage to the city.

zh-cn: 长江三峡水利枢纽工程

description.zh-cn: 中国长江上游段建设的大型水利工程项目。为解决工程带来的移民和行政管理问题，促成了1997年重庆直辖市的设立。
description.en: A large-scale hydraulic engineering project on the upper section of the Yangtze River in China. The establishment of Chongqing as a direct-administered municipality in 1997 was driven by the need to address the resettlement and administrative issues arising from the project.

nodes.id: 第八届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第八届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关，其第五次会议于1997年批准设立重庆直辖市。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China. Its fifth session in 1997 approved the establishment of Chongqing as a direct-administered municipality.

description.zh-cn: 清朝与日本在甲午战争后签订的条约，其中规定重庆成为向日本开放的内陆通商口岸之一。
description.en: A treaty signed between the Qing dynasty and Japan after the First Sino-Japanese War, which stipulated that Chongqing would become one of the inland treaty ports opened to Japan.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾主持修建大田湾体育场。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China who presided over the construction of Datianwan Stadium.

description.zh-cn: 位于重庆市渝中区，是1949年后重庆修建的第一个大型体育场馆，也是中国第一座现代意义上的综合体育场。
description.en: Located in Yuzhong District, Chongqing, it was the first large-scale stadium built in Chongqing after 1949 and the first modern comprehensive stadium in China.

relationships.target: 中国共产党重庆市委员会

description.zh-cn: 2022年12月起，袁家军担任中共重庆市委书记。
description.en: Since December 2022, Yuan Jiajun has served as the Secretary of the CPC Chongqing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2021年12月起，胡衡华担任重庆市市长。
description.en: Since December 2021, Hu Henghua has served as the Mayor of Chongqing.

description.zh-cn: 因其即位是“双重喜庆”，遂将自己曾藩封的恭州升为重庆府，重庆由此得名。
description.en: Because his enthronement was a 'double celebration', he elevated his former fief of Gongzhou to Chongqing Fu, from which the city gets its name.

description.zh-cn: 赵惇是宋孝宗的第三子。
description.en: Zhao Dun was the third son of Emperor Xiaozong of Song.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期，国民政府颁布《国民政府移驻重庆宣言》，定重庆为战时首都和永久陪都。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, the Nationalist Government issued the 'Declaration of the National Government's Relocation to Chongqing', designating Chongqing as the wartime capital and permanent auxiliary capital.

description.zh-cn: 由于抗日战争爆发，国民政府迁都，使重庆成为中国的战时首都及反法西斯战争远东指挥中心。
description.en: Due to the outbreak of the Second Sino-Japanese War, the Nationalist Government relocated its capital, making Chongqing China's wartime capital and the Far East Command Center for the anti-fascist war.

description.zh-cn: 从1938年到1944年，日本对重庆进行了长达6年半的战略轰炸。
description.en: From 1938 to 1944, Japan conducted strategic bombing of Chongqing for six and a half years.

description.zh-cn: 长期的战略轰炸对重庆市造成了惨重的人员伤亡和财产损失。
description.en: The prolonged strategic bombing caused heavy casualties and property damage to the city of Chongqing.

relationships.source: 第八届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 第八届全国人大五次会议审议通过了设立重庆直辖市的议案。
description.en: The Fifth Session of the 8th National People's Congress reviewed and approved the proposal to establish Chongqing as a direct-administered municipality.

description.zh-cn: 因三峡工程建设带来的移民安置和库区管理需要，促使中央决定设立重庆直辖市。
description.en: The need for resettlement and reservoir area management brought by the Three Gorges Project prompted the central government to establish Chongqing as a direct-administered municipality.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命初期，重庆发生了全国闻名的使用重型装备的大规模武斗。
description.en: In the early stages of the Cultural Revolution, Chongqing experienced large-scale armed conflicts, famous throughout the country for the use of heavy equipment.

description.zh-cn: 重庆大武斗使市区工业受到严重破坏，造成大量人员伤亡和巨大的经济损失。
description.en: The large-scale armed conflicts in Chongqing severely damaged the city's industry, causing numerous casualties and huge economic losses.

description.zh-cn: 灭巴国后，张仪在江州筑城，这被认为是重庆有史记载的建城之始。
description.en: After conquering the state of Ba, Zhang Yi built a city wall in Jiangzhou, which is considered the recorded beginning of Chongqing's city construction.

description.zh-cn: 《马关条约》规定重庆成为向日本开放的内陆通商口岸，加剧了外国势力对该地区的影响。
description.en: The Treaty of Shimonoseki designated Chongqing as an inland treaty port open to Japan, intensifying foreign influence in the region.

description.zh-cn: 贺龙于1951年主持修建大田湾体育场，该体育场于1956年竣工。
description.en: He Long presided over the construction of Datianwan Stadium starting in 1951, and the stadium was completed in May 1956.
